channel.title: I need help. HELPER GETS CO. :)
channel.description:
I am trying to make my own client. It is currently based on DragonScape (I have 4 different clients, all of which are not working for me :mad: when I run.bat, all I get is this: (Without the ----'s obviously lol)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI at java.URLClassLoader$.run(URL ClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass.(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:256) at java.lang.ClassLoader.LoadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.LoadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319)[/b] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you know what is wrong, please PM me or post here. ;)

item.title: I need help. HELPER GETS CO. :)
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

That was fast :o thanks for replying :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2008, 10:43:58 pm[/size][hr]That was fast :o thanks for replying :)[quote=“recker450, post:2, topic:229819”]use galkon’s base in class8.java u edit ur custom item
class5 is custom npc[/quote]OK. Awsome. But I don’t really think it helps my lil problem of

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI
at java.URLClassLoader$.run(URL ClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass.(ClassLoader.java:306)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:256)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.LoadClass(ClassLoader.java:251)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.LoadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319)

Read full topic
